zcthreads Library version 1.3
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES

Uses of Package
zc.thread

Classes in zc.thread used by zc.thread
AbstractSharedQueue
          Base implementation for derived SharedQueue classes.
Barrier.Command
          Interface for functions to run at synchronization points.
BoundedSharedQueue
          A SharedQueue that have a maximum capacity.
BrokenBarrierException
          Thrown by Barriers when their integrity has been compromized.
Channel
          Interface for message passing conduit between two threads.
CondVar
          Implements a simple "condition variable." The notion is that a thread awaits for some condition to become true.
Latch
          A latch is a specialized CondVar that once set cannot be reset ever.
Lock
          Main interface for Semaphore, Mutex and CondVar.
RWLock
          A RWLock accepts any number of concurrent Readers when there is no Writer and permits only a single Writer when there is no Readers.
RWLockWriters.SNL
          Specific Notification Lock
SharedQueue
          A fully synchronized object container aimed for inter-thread communication.
SwingWorker.ThreadVar
          Class to maintain reference to current worker thread under separate synchronization control.
TimeoutException
          Thrown by synchronization classes that report timeouts via exceptions.
